short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab with limitless AI-generated wallpapers & quotes that refresh every hour.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Ambience, a Chrome extension that blends productivity, inspiration, and eye-catching visuals into one seamless experience. 

Your new tab comes alive with AI-generated wallpapers that refresh every hour, keeping things fresh and exciting. And to spark your creativity, each stunning background is paired with an inspiring AI-generated quote.

Powered by the advanced Leap API, Ambience takes you on an artistic journey filled with unique visuals. 

Curious about the inspiration behind the art? Get a peek at the image prompts that fueled each AI-generated masterpiece & download your favorite wallpapers.

Ambience is more than just a pretty picture. It's an experience where amazing visuals, thoughtful quotes, and immersive work sessions come together. Dive into a world where inspiration flows, focus is sharp, and motivation stays strongâ€”all thanks to the fantastic Ambience Chrome extension.
